title: Pattern Printer
description: Write a program that prints a pattern of asterisks (*) based on user input. The pattern should have a specified number of rows, and each row should have a number of asterisks equal to the row number. For example, if the user inputs 5, the program should print a pattern with 5 rows, where the first row has 1 asterisk, the second row has 2 asterisks, and so on.
